content.raw:
Running a manual test, it is segfault in my box:

```
(gdb) bt
#0  _M_lower_bound (this=<optimized out>, __k=..., __y=0x1978290, 
    __x=0x382e392d) at /usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_tree.h:1141
#1  lower_bound (__k=..., this=0x1978288)
    at /usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_tree.h:879
#2  lower_bound (__x=..., this=0x1978288)
    at /usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_map.h:864
#3  operator[] (__k=..., this=0x1978288)
    at /usr/include/c++/4.8/bits/stl_map.h:461
#4  gazebo::physics::Preset::SetParam (this=this@entry=0x19aa328, _key=..., 
    _value=...) at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:91
#5  0x00007ffff73aff62 in gazebo::physics::PresetManager::GeneratePresetFromSDF
    (this=this@entry=0x1e65930, _preset=0x19aa328, _elem=...)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:380
#6  0x00007ffff73b01a6 in gazebo::physics::PresetManager::ProfileSDF (
    this=this@entry=0x1e65930, _name=..., _sdf=...)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:325
#7  0x00007ffff73b0328 in gazebo::physics::PresetManager::CreateProfile (
    this=this@entry=0x1e65930, _elem=...)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:291
#8  0x00007ffff73b0651 in gazebo::physics::PresetManager::PresetManager (
    this=0x1e65930, _physicsEngine=..., _sdf=...)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/PresetManager.cc:122
#9  0x00007ffff73bf513 in gazebo::physics::World::Init (this=0x19bf110)
---Type <return> to continue, or q <return> to quit---
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/World.cc:353
#10 0x00007ffff73a0ee2 in gazebo::physics::init_worlds ()
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/physics/PhysicsIface.cc:90
#11 0x0000000000412085 in gazebo::Server::LoadImpl (this=this@entry=0x6d4660, 
    _elem=..., _physics=...) at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:404
#12 0x00000000004129de in gazebo::Server::LoadFile (this=this@entry=0x6d4660, 
    _filename=..., _physics=...)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:306
#13 0x00000000004141c9 in gazebo::Server::ParseArgs (this=this@entry=0x6d4660, 
    _argc=_argc@entry=1, _argv=_argv@entry=0x7fffffffdbd8)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/Server.cc:264
#14 0x000000000040dc89 in main (argc=1, argv=0x7fffffffdbd8)
    at /home/jrivero/code/gazebo/gazebo/server_main.cc:37
```

Is it only a problem at my end?

#0  _M_lower_bound (this=<optimized out>, __k=..., __y=0x1978290,
